[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. When defense counters are removed, create a 0/0 black Army creature token if you don’t control one, then put that many +1/+1 counters on an Army you control.)[/i]
When this battle enters, create a tapped colorless Desert land token with “{T}: Add {C}.”
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you’ve spent five or more mana
to cast spells this turn, return this battle from your graveyard to the battlefield.
